instructors.name: מר ערן שחם
instructors.description: מנהל בית הספר להייטק וסייבר, בעל ניסיון עשיר של למעלה מ-30 שנים כמרצה ומנהל הדרכות בתחום הסייבר ואבטחת המידע. מנהל מרכזי הדרכה מורשים של החברות המובילות בעולם בתחום הווירטואליזציה, תקשורת ואבטחת מידע.

instructors.name: מר הילל קוברובסקי
instructors.description: יועץ אסטרטגי ומנטור טכנולוגי בתחומי הגנת סייבר, טרנדים ותחזיות טכנולוגיות, חדשנות ארגונית, עתידנות טכנולוגית, שיווק דיגיטלי והכשרה טכנולוגית מקצועית. מדריך טכנולוגי בכיר בתחומים של סייבר, אבטחת מידע ותקשורת נתונים.

instructors.name: מר איליה לוין
instructors.description: מומחה טכנולוגיות ענן ואבטחתו, בעל ותק של 8 שנים בתכנון, יעוץ והטמעת פתרונות ענן ללקוחות בינלאומיים. מרצה מוסמך של AWS ושל ISC2.

summary: The Certified Network Defender course is a comprehensive program designed to train cyber security and AWS cloud architecture experts. It aligns with the international training program of EC-Council Academia and prepares students for six prestigious international certifications. The course includes practical workshops on LinkedIn branding, presentation skills, and cloud-based exam simulations. Students will learn to build secure multi-layered architectures, configure protection solutions for Microsoft and Linux servers, and manage network security using Cisco, Fortinet, and Check Point technologies. The program is delivered by experienced instructors and offers a deep understanding of virtual and cloud infrastructure protection solutions. Graduates will receive three prestigious certificates from Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security.
full_text: COURSE NAME: Certified Network Defender. COURSE OVERVIEW: The complete program for training Cyber and AWS Cloud Architects according to the international training program of EC-Council Academia. The program prepares students for six international certifications and is taught by leading lecturers in Israel. The dual specialization in Cyber and Cloud increases employment opportunities for graduates. COURSE LEADERSHIP: The program is managed by Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security. Professional advisors include Mr. Hillel Koberovsky and Mr. Ilya Levin, who have decades of experience in information security and cyber training. COURSE SCHEDULE: The course starts on 31.12.2024 and lasts approximately ten months. Classes are held on Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00. The program includes 400 academic hours. LEARNING FORMAT: Classes are conducted at the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan. Some classes may be conducted via Zoom according to university guidelines. TUITION AND FEES: Registration fee is 480₪. Tuition fee is 19,800₪. Certification exams are external and require separate payment. Students receive VMware Workstation at no cost and significant discounts on most international exams. COURSE TOPICS: The course covers a wide range of topics including: Introduction to Cyber Security and Cloud Architecture, LinkedIn Workshop, Presentation Skills Workshop, Windows Server 2022, Linux Servers and LPIC-1 Exam Preparation, CCNA - Cisco Certified Network Associate, CCSA - Check Point Certified Security Administrator, NSE4 - Fortinet Network Security Expert, AWS Cloud Practitioner, AWS Solutions Architect Associate. REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: Registration is conducted through Eran Shaham Ltd. for Bar-Ilan University. Contact information includes: Main Office: 03-5318254, Designated Programs: 03-5317957, Security Forces Programs: 03-5317005/6, Pre-Academic Preparatory Program: 03-5317956, Haredi Campus: 077-2753094/8, Certificate Studies: 03-7384481. INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University is an authorized academy of leading manufacturers and organizations worldwide, including EC-Council, Fortinet, CISCO, and AWS. The program is taught by certified lecturers approved by the academy and leading manufacturers.
